message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to negotiate from here.
I'll try to get a better deal, but this is a fair starting point. Your turn!
You're trying to get a better deal, I'm trying to get a better deal. Let's see who blinks first!
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'm not giving in yet. I'll try to make a better offer. Your turn!
You're trying to squeeze me, but I'm not giving in yet. I'll meet you halfway, but that's as far as I'll go!
You're not giving me enough, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's see if we can find a middle ground. Your turn!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a small amount, but I need to get a good share for myself.
I'm not giving in yet. I'll make a final offer. If you accept, we can end this. If not, I'll walk away.
This is my last chance to get a good deal. I'm willing to take a risk to get a better share.
I'm not going to give in now. I'll take a small share and walk away. You can have most of it, but I'm not getting any less.
